name: linkedin-mcp-fps
description: LinkedIn job search MCP server with autonomous background scraping, database queries, and application tracking
long_description: An MCP server that provides LinkedIn job searching with autonomous background scraping into a SQLite database. Features include: live job exploration, composable database queries with full-text search, scraping profile management, application tracking, job change detection, and cache analytics. Supports both local (stdio) and remote (streamable-http) deployment.

tools.name: explore_latest_jobs
tools.description: Live scrape 1-10 most recent jobs matching keywords, location, and distance

tools.name: query_jobs
tools.description: Instant database query with composable filters (company, location, keywords, remote, visa)

tools.name: add_scraping_profile
tools.description: Add an autonomous background scraping profile

tools.name: list_scraping_profiles
tools.description: List all scraping profiles with status

tools.name: delete_scraping_profile
tools.description: Disable or hard-delete a scraping profile

tools.name: mark_job_applied
tools.description: Track a job application with optional notes

tools.name: update_application_status
tools.description: Update application status (applied, interviewing, rejected, offered, accepted)

tools.name: get_cache_analytics
tools.description: Database statistics, scraping profile status, and cache health

tools.name: get_job_changes
tools.description: Track field changes (salary, applicants, description) over time
